title: Brand Hijacking: Chevvrong Ad
content:
Saw this Chevvrong (Chevron) ad this morning, a clever brand hijacking pasted up geurilla style at an SF Bart station.

[![Chevvrong: Brand Hijack Sighting](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013095927im_/http:/farm4.static.flickr.com/3659/3551161703_2111412e73.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013095927/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/joepemberton/3551161703/ "Chevvrong: Brand Hijack Sighting by Joe Pemberton, on Flickr")
author: Joe Pemberton
